name: 'All' Movies Quiz | Something in the Title | 10 Questions

questions.text: James Woods co-starred in this 1984 movie as a spurned lover trying to find his girlfriend.
questions.explanation:
Against All Odds.

	Jeff Bridges starred as Terry Brogan, hired by James Woods' character Jake Wise to find his ex-girlfriend Jessica Wyler, played by Rachel Ward.  When Terry finds Jessica they fall in love and Jake is now out to find both of them.

questions.text: What 1976 movie dealt with the Watergate break-in?
questions.explanation:
All The President's Men.

	Robert Redford and Dustin Hoffman portrayed real life reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein who worked for the Washington Post.  Their journalistic efforts and insider information led to the uncovering of the Watergate scandal.

questions.text: This 1971 movie was directed by Roger Vadim and starred Rock Hudson as a football coach.
questions.correct: Pretty Maids All in a Row
questions.explanation:
Pretty Maids All in a Row.

	Rock Hudson portrayed Tiger McDrew, who had a habit of killing campus girls.  Telly Savalas co-starred as the police Captain who traced the campus murders back to McDrew.

questions.text: What 1951 movie saw Marilyn Monroe play a small part as an inspiring actress and co-starred Anne Baxter?
questions.explanation:
All About Eve.

	Bette Davis starred in this Academy Award winning movie as Margo Channing and Anne Baxter starred as Eve Harrington, the conniving actress who tried to oust Margo out of the limelight.  Marilyn Monroe had a very small part, but after this movie Ms. Monroe went on to bigger and better movie roles.

questions.text: What 1989 animated movie featured the voices of Burt Reynolds and Dom Deluise?
options: The Mouse and All His Friends
questions.explanation:
All Dogs Go To Heaven.

	Burt Reynolds provided the voice for Charlie and Dom Deluise provided the voice for Itchy.  They played two dogs on "death row" at the dog pound.

questions.text: What 1969 movie starred Sandy Dennis as an unwed pregnant woman?
options: All Dressed Up and Nowhere to Go
questions.explanation:
Thank You All Very Much.

	This drama was directed by Walter Hussein and saw Ian McKellan in a supporting role.

questions.text: This 1981 movie starred Gene Hackman as a drug store manager.
questions.explanation:
All Night Long.

	Gene Hackman portrayed the manager of an all night drug store which had very strange customers. Barbra Streisand also starred in this comedy movie.

questions.text: What 1949 movie starred Broderick Crawford as a corrupt southern governor?
questions.explanation:
All the King's Men.

	This movie was based upon the novel Robert Penn Warren, which was based on the true life story of politican Huey Long.  The movie won 3 Academy Awards (Best Picture, Best Actor and Best Supporting Actress).

questions.text: This 1988 movie starred Dennis Quaid as a legendary football hero.
questions.explanation:
Everybody's All American.

	Jessica Lange co-starred as the prom queen who married the all-American football player, portrayed by Dennis Quaid.  Also co-starring were John Goodman and Timothy Hutton.

questions.text: What 1979 movie was directed by Bob Fosse and was somewhat based on his life?
questions.explanation:
All That Jazz.

	Roy Scheider portrayed Joe Gideon, who (like Bob Fosse) was a movie director, theater producer/director and dancer.
